metadata.title: CVE-2019-12922 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
A CSRF issue in phpMyAdmin 4.9.0.1 allows deletion of any server in theSetup page.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-12922` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

phpmyadmin - 4:4.9.2+dfsg1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: phpmyadmin package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4:4.9.2+dfsg1-1').
